mutche matter pope breaſte ſo deepe full darkeneſſe ſpecially ſaie lavviers phraſe man maie ſafely enter onely neuer ſtudent lavve lette v therefore ſee owne canoniſtes lavviers ſelues haue meante hereby firſte albaldus baldus peruſium ſaithe papa eſt doctor vtrius que iuris authoritate non scientia pope doctour bothe lawes wel ciuile canon authoritie knowledge wee finde howe ſo euer pope ſtoared learninge yet leaſte doctoure authoritie youre gloſe ſaithe 9 quae 3 ne que ab auguſto dis 19 si romanorum gloſs etſi totus mundus ſententiaret aliquo negotio contra papam tamen videtur quod ſtandum fit ſententiae papae iura enim omnia scrinio pectoris ſui habere videtur quod ergo papa approbat vel reprobat no approbate vel reprobare debemus quiſquis ergo non obedit statutis romanae eccleſiae haereticus eſt cenſendus cheaſte pope boſome et sacrilegij inſtar eſſet diſputare de facto papae although al worlde woulde iudge mater againſte pope yet ſeemeth wee ought ſtande iudgemente pope ſeemeth haue al lavves cheaſte boſomediſt 40 si papa 〈◊〉 gloſsa therefore ſo euer pope either alloweth diſalloweth wee bounde likewiſe allowe diſallowe ſame ſo euer obedient lawes churche rome
